snippet: A $1.2 billion project at Kennedy International Airport, to be completed in 2013, is to make baggage screening faster and shops more accessible to international travelers.
abstract: Terminal 4 at Kennedy International Airport has been undergoing $1.2 billion expansion, to be completed in 2013, that will make baggage screening faster and shops more accessible to international travelers.
lead_paragraph: A $1.2 billion project at Kennedy International Airport, to be completed in 2013, is to make baggage screening faster and shops more accessible to international travelers.

headline.seo: Terminal 4 Expansion at J.F.K. to Be Inspected
headline.main: A Peek at Easier Travel at Kennedy’s Terminal 4
headline.print_headline: At Kennedy, Progress On Travail Of Travel
